column1: New Years Day means another great @RoseParade in Pasadena and the 100th Anniversary of the 19th Amendment! @2020Pasadena is celebrating by creating a great rose float and they're close to their fundraising goal so please consider supporting them and visit: https://t.co/EKuTbfAEVu

#MerryChristmas and #HappyHolidays! I want to thank all the remarkable people who donated toys to my Holiday Toy Drive as well as the incredible nonprofit groups that delivered the toys to families in #SGV. Its people like you that make the holidays brighter for our communities! https://t.co/LdLVaosrFh

I was proud to join @UNITEHERE11 to fight for airline catering workers who can't wait to access health care or overdue raises while @AmericanAir posts record profits. It's time to #RaiseLAX so that workers dont have to choose between paying bills or getting medical treatment! https://t.co/HmpvDKtgpZ

Operation Gobble 2019 was a big success! With the help of SGV Water Co we gave 170 turkeys to 20 amazing orgs such as Sierra Madre VFW Alhambra High Dream Center and Altadena Senior Center. These turkeys will go to families in the SGV to make #Thanksgiving special! #Thankful https://t.co/mzMMx0LqsY

I stand with the Kaiser workers!  So many came out this weekend to express their voices for a higher quality of life in which they can support their families. Kaiser workers took such good care of my parents in their last years. I want to make sure we take care of them.
They stand up for their patients; let’s stand up for our nurses! Let’s ensure that they have the best working conditions possible! I support our SEIU 121RN nurses.
Nurses are the backbone of our healthcare system. They are on the front line with patients and know best what it will take to help patients recover.
